meanings.sent1: The susurrous leaves danced in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent2: The forest was filled with the susurrous sound of the wind through the trees.
meanings.sent3: The susurrous sound of the curtains moving made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: The susurrous whispers of the audience filled the theater with anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The susurrous waves lapping against the shore lulled me to sleep.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or producing a whispering or rustling sound.
meanings.sent1: The susurrous wind in the night made the trees seem alive.
meanings.sent2: The susurrous nature of the library created a peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The susurrous rustling of the papers made the office feel mysterious.
meanings.sent4: The susurrous voices in the hallway hinted at a secret conversation.
meanings.sent5: The susurrous rain on the roof provided a soothing background noise.
